integratePartials in interface LikelihoodCore
Parameters:
nodeIndex - the node at which to calculate the likelihoods
proportions - the proportions of sites in each category

Integrates partials across categories.

Parameters:
inPartials - the array of partials to be integrated
proportions - the proportions of sites in each category
outPartials - an array into which the partials will go
